policies.name: all - database, table, column
policies.description: Policy for all - database, table, column

policies.name: reason
policies.description: row filter expression with a key in the table itself

policies.name: inventory
policies.description: scalar expression with the table itself

rowFilterInfo.filterExpr: key in (select key from rangertbl2 where key < 100)

configs.name: jdbc.url
configs.uiHint:
{"TextFieldWithIcon":true, "info": "1.For Remote Mode, eg.
jdbc:hive2://<host>:<port>
2.For Embedded Mode (no host or port), eg.
jdbc:hive2:///;initFile=<file>
3.For HTTP Mode, eg.
jdbc:hive2://<host>:<port>/;
transportMode=http;httpPath=<httpPath>
4.For SSL Mode, eg.
jdbc:hive2://<host>:<port>/;ssl=true;
sslTrustStore=tStore;trustStorePassword=pw
5.For ZooKeeper Mode, eg.
jdbc:hive2://<host>/;serviceDiscoveryMode=
zooKeeper;zooKeeperNamespace=hiveserver2
6.For Kerberos Mode, eg.
jdbc:hive2://<host>:<port>/;
principal=hive/domain@EXAMPLE.COM
"}

maskTypes.name: MASK
maskTypes.label: Redact
maskTypes.description: Replace lowercase with 'x', uppercase with 'X', digits with '0'

maskTypes.name: MASK_SHOW_LAST_4
maskTypes.label: Partial mask: show last 4
maskTypes.description: Show last 4 characters; replace rest with 'x'

maskTypes.name: MASK_SHOW_FIRST_4
maskTypes.label: Partial mask: show first 4
maskTypes.description: Show first 4 characters; replace rest with 'x'
